data.title: Employee-led Impact
data.meta_description: Dell Technologies team members create the change they want to see in the world, supported by a culture of volunteerism and programs to help those most in need.
data.text:
Every donation a team member makes to a vetted nonprofit organization made is matched dollar for dollar â€” up to $10,000 USD annually per employee. And every team member who logs 10 hours or more of volunteering each quarter receives a voucher for $150 USD that they can donate to the vetted charity of their choice.

We believe so strongly in the power of our team and their philanthropic action that we have committed to two ambitious targets as part of our 2030 Plan:

By 2030, 75% of our team members will participate in giving or volunteerism in their communities

By 2030, we will use our expertise and technology to support the digital transformation of 1,000 nonprofits partners
